        private CmdClient(java.lang.String[] cmdArgs)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                  java.rmi.RemoteException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        cmdArgs - Command line arguments
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Not enough / illegal command-line arguments
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect to RMI registry
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Remote service is not running

        Parameters:
